name: smart-waste-management-backend

scripts.build: cd ../cpp && g++ -o ../backend/bin/quadtree quadtree.cpp -I./include -std=c++17 && g++ -o ../backend/bin/dijkstra dijkstra.cpp -I./include -std=c++17 && g++ -o ../backend/bin/priority_queue priority_queue.cpp -I./include -std=c++17

author: Your Name
description: Backend for Smart Waste Management System with Supabase, Node.js, and C++ optimizations
